summary: combine of Mikolaj Machowski's VST and Estienne Swart's rest.vim
name: vst_with_syn
description:
Fixed non-broken space bug in chinese environment. (just change scriptencoding to utf-8)
Fixed '\&#039 escape bug to make VST more python-restructure like, and the code more clear.
Take Estienne Swart's rest.vim in and make it VST compatible,and fix bugs.

I would like to send this to Mikolaj Machowski, but I can't contact him. So I upload it here, before Mikolaj Machowski got it :))
